main.name: Shyamsunder Soni
main.description: I am an IT Professional with 5+ years of experience (Full Stack, MEAN, MERN) in providing quality solutions to complex business problems within scope, budget and tight schedules.
main.bio: I have explicit knowledge of Mobile device architectures and Mobile development platforms, framework APIs like GPS, Web-Service, Location, Camera, Notifications, Map API, Shared Preferences, Cloud Firestore/Firebase/Functions, SQLite, Push Notifications. Experience in working on social features like Facebook SDK, Twitter API integration.

work.title: Angular/Full Stack Developer
work.description:
● Requirement Gathering and Analysis 
● Programming, designing, and creating the architectures of Website Designing and Development Projects. 
● Participate in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code. 
● Prepare reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation, and maintenance of software. 
● Proficient with Node and Angular 
● Hands-on experience with JavaScript frameworks and libraries such as Angular JS, React 
● Experience with Jquery and Chrome Dev Tools 
● Knowledge of modern web application design, responsive design, or mobile hybrid design 
● Source control (preferably Git Hub) 
● Use of asynchronous data send and retrieval patterns to develop rich in-browser user interfaces 
● Expert level problem solving skills
